html:
I am the Lord... —(see the notes atIsaiah 42:8; Isaiah 43:2; Isaiah 44:8 ;Isaiah 45:14, Isaiah 45:18 ,Isaiah 45:22).

I girded thee... —(see the note atIsaiah 45:1). The sense is, I girded thee with the girdle—the military belt; I prepared thee, and strengthened thee for war and conquest. Even people who are strangers to the true God are sustained by him, and are unable to accomplish anything without his providential aid.
